patthana15.85:1.1_0: Araṇaṁ maggārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasaraṇo namaggārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana15.85:2.1_0: Araṇaṁ maggahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasaraṇo namaggahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana15.85:3.1_0: Araṇaṁ maggādhipatiṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasaraṇo namaggādhipati dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
